message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10% this time.  We can negotiate further in the next rounds.
My turn to propose something more reasonable. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is too much. Let's split it 55/45, giving you a bigger share but still being fair.  We both have a lot to lose if we keep rejecting each other's offers.
Okay, let's meet in the middle. I'll come down a bit to 58/42. This considers the time pressure and gives us both a decent share.
